nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, a secret hangar was located in the Coruscant tower and was used by Darth Sidious and Darth Tyranus, known publicly as Supreme Chancellor of the Galactic Republic Sheev Palpatine and Count Dooku, respectively. Shortly after the First Battle of Geonosis, Dooku met Sidious in the hangar, and in the closing stages of the war the hangar was used again when Dooku was summoned by Sidious after sensing that Jedi Master Yoda was on Moraband, the ancient homeworld of the Sith.
